note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
### About
I'm currently pursuing a master's degree in Statistics at Harvard University. I got my BS in engineering / applied maths from Ecole Centrale Paris in France. I'm a decent programmer, a decent mathematician, but a terrible engineer: don't ask me to build a bridge, I would know where to start.

### Open Projects
I currently have only one non work-related project: a code generator for generic gibbs samplers in R. It is still in early development, but will be pushed to github soon.
name: Guillaume Basse
